features: Make/Answer Calls & Read Message: Smart watch has equipped with a built-in premium microphone and speaker, which can give you a great calling experience. Through bluetooth connection, the smartwatch women men can directly use the watch to answer make calls/play music/read messages/store contacts/view call history. Get real-time notifications of your calls, texts, and messages, including Facebook, Twitter, lnstagram, WhatsApp and more. It ensures that you never miss any important messages.

Heart Rate, Sleep & Activity Tracking: With our fitness tracker watch , it accurately monitors your heart rate in real time. Also, it provides a detailed analysis of your sleep quality by continuously recording your sleep patterns. During exercise, smartwatch automatically records daily steps, distance counter，calories burned, active minutes, measure your blood oxygen saturation and understand you.

1.91" Full HD Touch Screen & DIY Background: Using the latest technology, this smart watch for android ios phones is equipped with a 1.91-inch ultra-clear full-touch color screen, It ensures smooth operations and 240*296 resolution for you. Our screen is better at color saturation and reproduction. Personalize your smart watch for men women with multiple customized watch faces provided, make your own stylish smart watch.

100 Sports Modes & IP68 Waterproof: Smart tracker app has more than 100 built-in exercise modes, Includes cycling, hiking, fitness and more. Optimised exercise algorithms accurately record your activity data throughout the day, Tracks all exercise distances and fitness during exercise. Fitness watch is IP68 life waterproof, you can wear it while washing your hands.

Long-lasting Battery Life & Broad Compatibility: Built-in high-capacity energy-saving battery, lighter and safer, more friendly to the environment. It lasts for 5-7 days in heart rate monitoring mode and has an extra long standby time of 14 days. Support Android 6.0 and above, iOS 9.0 and above smartphones.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Multifunctional Smart Watch Bluetooth Talking Smartwatch: make and receive calls directly from the watch.

About Step Counting: The first day's pedometer data is cleared at 24:00 on the same day, and the next day's steps are re-recorded, to view the data, please synchronize the watch app data and can be viewed in the app.

Previous page Sleep of the first day is cleared at 18 the next night. To view the data, please check through App. Heart Rate Monitor: 24 hours continuous heart rate monitoring Add My Family: View family members' health status and exercise dates. Next page 1 Sleep Monitor 2 Heart Monitor 3 Oxygen Monitor
Previous page Next page 1 Message 2 Music 3 Size
A221 Smartwatch Enjoy Your Life GO

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best value for the money.
reviews.reviewText: This watch was fantastic. Put it on, set it up, chose the settings I wanted and "face" and good to go. Actually great to go. I like the fact my phone can be on silent and the watch and the watch can vibrate only to show me who is calling or incoming text messages and messages from my favorite applications like messenger and more. Definitely a home run with this watch and its features. The phone app works well also and gives you tons of data. Highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product with good value for money. Few customization options, but you'll find something you like. The result is as expected. The battery lasts for days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality & Great Value
reviews.reviewText: Super high quality smart watch, and very easy to set up with your phone. This was a gift for my father in law & he absolutely loves it. It also tells you the watch band size, so if you want to order different styles, you can.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the money
reviews.reviewText: I bought this smartwatch to give to a friend for Christmas and he loved it. It has everything you could want at a very attractive price. You can answer calls, track your fitness activity, has several customization options, sport modes and it is waterproof. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: ** Update**After 1 month of use, the watch started to not function the same. Not syncing my contacts, not pushing notifications. Then a week ago the watch stopped working. Tried everything until I needed to reboot the watch. Then once I did, the watch worked good. But every 2 days I need to reboot the watch to start working properly.... how annoying! So I stopped using it.I really like this watch. Everything works as describes. I even like the feature you can talk on the phone thru the watch. Can't text on it but that doesn't bother me. Great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the price
reviews.reviewText: I love this smart watch! It's simple and very handy to use at work. Who needs an expensive smart watch when you can get this one for cheap?!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compared the watch to an Apple Watch. He loved his Christmas gift.
reviews.reviewText: My brother loved his Christmas present ! He told me the battery life is good for a few days. He can receive texts and phone calls on it. He compared it to the options offered on an Apple Watch. Obvious the price is reasonable. I would definitely purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Broke after about 12 days
reviews.reviewText: I am really impressed with this watch. I’ve had it for about a week now and it’s been working great. It has a lot of features all which are very useful for me. Helps me keep track so I can reach my step goals. It really is a great product and extremely affordable.Update*** 2/2/24Unfortunately, the watch just stopped working today. It started refusing to turn on despite being charged and now the screen is just pitch black. Now I have to return and look for a new one, how disappointing.

Bought this watch as a Christmas gift for my wife and she’s very pleased and happy with it. She’s impressed with all that it can do. She can take a telephone call with it. She’s also very pleased that she only has to charge it after a good 7 days of use. Overall a great watch.
I loved it! It’s very convenient and light! I use it everyday and it’s comfortable on my wrist
La montre à plusieurs options, elle est simple à utiliser. Belle visuellement, le bracelet tient bien.
